title: my account banned for no reason.
body: riot im a silver player and i was in normal. solo que and i was playing a game as top lane jax and ive never played jax before and i was playing and two people on the enemy  team told me they were smurfing and they were diamond 5 and i was laned against one and was really unfair i didnt give up i kept trying i was farming building the right items and i was trying but i kept getting 1 shot and they even 1v5 my team and killed us yes my score was very bad but i got reported for feeding and banned and i didnt report anyone because u cant really do anything about what we were matched up against and i dont see as to why i got banned for that its really unfair and i actually got a note from yous saying good work for being a good behavior player. i would really like yous to look into that match and watch what actually happend because i shouldnt be reported and banned for that matter please riot i need my account back i put alot of time and RP into it please guys. just take a look please i beg yous.

replies.body: Your account wouldn't be banned unless the feeding was intentional, otherwise it would be for toxicity, so is there something you haven't told us?

i wasnt intent i was farming and was trying but i kept getting 1 shot. and teamed up on. it was really unfair and they out skilled me and others on my team. i wasnt that toxic i was talking about another game with a mate in chat. and actually trying i got a note from riot saying i have been good at behavior and couldnt really help what i was laned up against and got reported for feeding because of it.
I feel like this is mostly full of shit.
i used this trick when i was 5 years old ;/

Hey summoner,

Since it is an account specific inquiry and we can't really help you out on the boards. If you want to appeal your case, you should send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Riot. 
From now its basically a waiting game.

Here are some guidelines for submitting a support ticket that will ensure the smoothest and fastest response possible:

> Please create a max of 1 ticket about this issue, and do not try to add any information afterwards/submit multiple as it will bump it to the back of the queue. It can take up to 7 business days for them to get back to you (although majority of tickets are answered within 48 hours), so be patient
